Released	May 13, 2003
Recorded	2003 at Spider Studios in Strongsville, Ohio
Genre	Groove metal, metalcore, thrash metal
Length	59:02
Label	Roadrunner
Producer	Ben Schigel

Chimaira is an American heavy metal band from Cleveland, Ohio. Formed in 1998, the group is a notable member of the New Wave of American Heavy Metal scene.The band's name is derived from the word Chimera, a monstrous creature in Greek mythology. Throughout its history, the band have endured numerous line-up changes, leaving vocalist Mark Hunter as the only original member.
